Synopsis: 
Nick, a candidate for an executive position (Jason Bateman), works for 12 hours and swallows everything that happens to your boss, Harken (Kevin Spacey), thinking about the promise of a well-deserved promotion. But now I know that's never going to happen. At the same time, Dale (Charlie Day), a dental assistant, has real problems to hold off the unstoppable sexual advances by Dr. Julia Harris (Jennifer Aniston), when she suddenly decides to raise the temperature. And Kurt (Jason Sudeikis), an accountant by profession, has just learned that the corrupt new owner of your company, pellita (Colin Farrell), is not only determined to ruin his career but also has plans to release toxic waste in a population without anybody noticing. 

What can you do when your boss is a psychopath, a man-eating or a guy with no scruples? 

The flight is not an option. Someone has to stop them those monsters. Therefore, with the force that gives a few drinks and questionable advice from an ex-convict for whom everything has a price (Jamie Foxx), the three protagonists prepare a perfect plan to rid the rest of the world of their heads ... forever. 

But even the best plans are only as good as the brains behind them.
